summary: A multi-file viewer project (at least 5 files) with GGFan shoutouts, file counter display, and a button on file 5 linking to https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money

existing_features.title: On the fifth story page (File 5), add a prominently styled button that opens https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money in a new browser tab when clicked. The button should be clearly visible and placed near the bottom of the page content, distinct from the existing previous/next navigation buttons.

new_feature_requests.summary: On file 5, add a button that navigates the reader to https://www.youtube.com/@E.J-Money
